ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Post Corporation's acquisition
PrecisOrder approving a) the acquisition of all the Innovapost Inc. common shares held by CGI Group Inc.; and b) the sale of 20 percent of the Innovapost Inc. common shares to Purolator Inc.
